titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program.
To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 the Military and Civilian Partnership for Trauma Readiness Grant Program. This program enables civilian trauma centers to incorporate military trauma care providers into trauma care and practice.
